contentEmail.title: Hello again!
contentEmail.subtitle: Log in and keep enjoying all your benefits.
contentEmail.noAccount: Don't have an account yet? Sign up

contentPassword.title: Enter your password
contentPassword.subtitle: Log in and keep enjoying all your benefits.

contentEmail.title: Welcome!
contentEmail.subtitle: Access your niba area and start managing your energy like never before.

contentPassword.title: Set your password
contentPassword.subtitle: Access your personal area and manage your energy information from anywhere.

infoPassword.two: Must include at least one lowercase letter
infoPassword.three: Must include at least one uppercase letter
infoPassword.four: Must include at least one special character

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

profileInfoPersonalData.title: Personal data
profileInfoPersonalData.subtitle: If you need to modify your personal data, call us at 900 92 61 61.

profileInfoAccessDataEmail.title: Email
profileInfoAccessDataEmail.subtitle: Remember! If you change your email, from now on you'll use it to access all niba services.

profileInfoAccessDataPassword.title: Password
profileInfoAccessDataPassword.subtitle:
Your new password will be your access key to all niba services from now on.
Choose wisely!

infoPassword.two: Must include at least one lowercase letter
infoPassword.three: Must include at least one uppercase letter
infoPassword.four: Must include at least one special character

profileInfoContactDataChangeEmail.title: Email
profileInfoContactDataChangeEmail.subtitle: Remember! If you change your email, from now on:
profileInfoContactDataChangeEmail.extra1: You'll receive all our communications at this address.

profileInfoContactDataChangePhone.title: Phone
profileInfoContactDataChangePhone.subtitle: Remember! If you change your phone number, from now on you'll receive all our SMS communications at this number.

profileInfoConfigLanguages.title: Languages
profileInfoConfigLanguages.subtitle: Select your preferred language for the app.

terms.title: Terms of use and conditions
terms.subtitle: Review the terms of use and conditions

confirmYourAccount.title: Confirm your account
confirmYourAccount.subtitle: Thank you! We've sent an email to confirm your account.

verifyResetPassword.title: Link sent!
verifyResetPassword.subtitle: Thank you! We've sent an email with instructions to reset your password.

changeEmail.title: Change email
changeEmail.subtitle: Enter your password to change your email data.

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.subtitle: Enter your password to create a new password.

logout.title: Sign out
logout.subtitle: Are you sure you want to sign out of the private area?

deleteAccount.title: Delete my account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

description.first: Before continuing, please consider the following:
description.second: If you have active supply contracts, deleting your account does not imply cancellation of those services.
description.third: You will continue to receive invoices and important communications through the channels you have indicated (email).
description.fourth: We will retain part of your information for the time necessary to comply with our legal and contractual obligations (for example, billing and warranties).

deleteAccount.warning: If you wish to manage your contracts or unsubscribe from the electrical supply service, please contact us through Customer Support at 900 92 61 61.
deleteAccount.confirmation: Do you want to continue with the deletion of your private area?

selectImage.title: Select image
selectImage.subtitle: Choose an image from your gallery or take a new photo.
selectImage.galleryPermission: To select photos, we need access to your gallery. Please grant permission in settings.
selectImage.cameraPermission: To take photos, we need access to your camera. Please grant permission in settings.
